page.title: 19 Communications
page.content: {Postal Services:}There are 304 postal collections daily in Whitstable.Each box is opened 3 times & last post for delivery next day is 6pm. Telephones: Most families have their own. There are sufficient public phone boxes but no cardphones. {Trains:}Whitstable Railway Station is on the London to Ramsgate line.There are 2 trains an hour in the day,(more at peak hours). The journey takes 1h.20mins. The fare is Â£12.40 return.{ {Buses: There are 3 buses}an hour to Canterbury & Herne Bay.The fare is Â£1.80.There is 1 bus an hour going to Faversham & coaches to London. {Cars: }Most families have either 1 or 2.Taxis: Are widely used.{ {Shipping:}Cargo ships from various parts of Britain and Europe arrive weekly at the Harbour.
